title: A Story of Escape: Episode 4 with Salwa Alzahrani, sound corrected
description:
Salwa Alzahrani escaped from Saudi Arabia in April of 2018, living now as a protected person Canada. We talk about her escape, her views on guardianship laws, twitter and Rahaf Mohammad, and Free From Hijab Day. Salwa is courageously showing others living under oppressive guardianship laws what a free life looks like through social media.

**note: still working on the split screen problems...I'll get there guys

Follow Salwa here:

twitter: @ffeminist0
Instagram: @ffeminist00
snapchat: ffeminist0
youtube: https://youtu.be/ceQ1WWAAudw 

Follow me here:
twitter: @theother_95
instagram: @theother95
facebook: @theother95page

email me at theotherninetyfive@gmail.com
